00027 
00028  SUBROUTINE Parameters
00029 
00030 ! Common Variables
00031  USE Domain
00032  USE FluidParams
00033  IMPLICIT NONE
00034 
00035 ! Local Variables
00036  INTEGER :: i
00037  INTEGER :: IO_ERR
00038 
00039 ! Read input data from file "properties.in"
00040  OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "properties.in", STATUS = "OLD", ACTION = "READ", &
00041       IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00042  IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00043    READ(10,*)
00044    READ(10,*) Maxstep
00045    READ(10,*)
00046    READ(10,*) tStat, tDump
00047    READ(10,*)
00048    READ(10,*) xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax
00049    READ(10,*)
00050    READ(10,*) rhoL, rhoH
00051    READ(10,*)
00052    READ(10,*) tauL, tauH
00053    READ(10,*)
00054    READ(10,*) IntWidth, sigma
00055    READ(10,*)
00056    READ(10,*) pConv
00057    CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00058  ELSE
00059    STOP "Error: Unable to open input file 'properties.in'."
00060  END IF
00061 
00062 
00063 !  Read bubble positions from file "discrete.in"
00064  OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "discrete.in", STATUS = "OLD", ACTION = "READ", &
00065       IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00066  IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00067    READ(10,*)
00068    READ(10,*) nBubbles
00069    READ(10,*)
00070    ALLOCATE( bubbles(1:nBubbles,1:3) )
00071    DO i = 1, nBubbles
00072      READ(10,*) bubbles(i,1), bubbles(i,2), bubbles(i,3)
00073    END DO
00074    CLOSE(UNIT=10)
00075  ELSE
00076    STOP "Error: Unable to open input file 'discrete.in'."
00077  END IF
00078 
00079 ! Scale parameters for order parameter mesh
00080  sigma    = 2.D0*sigma
00081  IntWidth = 2.D0*IntWidth
00082  DO i = 1, nBubbles
00083    bubbles(i,1) = 2*bubbles(i,1) - 1
00084    bubbles(i,2) = 2*bubbles(i,2) - 1
00085    bubbles(i,3) = 2*bubbles(i,3)
00086  END DO
00087 
00088 ! Constants needed in
00089  beta    = 12.D0*sigma/( IntWidth*( (rhoH - rhoL)**4 ) )
00090  kappa   = 1.5D0*sigma*IntWidth/( (rhoH - rhoL)**2 )
00091  beta4   = 4.0D0*beta
00092  kappaG  = 0.25D0*kappa
00093  kappaEf = 8.D0*inv12*kappaG
00094  kappa_6 = inv6*kappa
00095  rhostar = 0.5D0*( rhoL + rhoH )
00096  tauRhoStar = (tauH - tauL)/(rhoH - rhoL)
00097 
00098 ! Domain Size (order parameter mesh)
00099  xmin_f = xmin
00100  ymin_f = ymin
00101  xmax_f = 2*xmax - 1
00102  ymax_f = 2*ymax - 1
00103 
00104 ! Redefine MaxStep (iterate between 0 and MaxStep-1)
00105  MaxStep = MaxStep - 1
00106 
00107 
00108  RETURN
00109  END SUBROUTINE Parameters
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:02:43 2008 for LL-2D-DGR by  1.5.6
